entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout was a squat little witch who wore a patched hat over her flyaway hair; there was usually a large amount of earth on her clothes, and her fingernails would have made Aunt Petunia faint.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart, however, was immaculate in sweeping robes of turquoise, his golden hair shining under a perfectly positioned turquoise hat with gold trimming.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: Professor Sprout’s arms were full of bandages, and with another twinge of guilt, Harry spotted the Whomping Willow in the distance, several of its branches now in slings.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry , Ron and Hermione had only just joined them when she came striding into view across the lawn, accompanied by Gilderoy Lockhart.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry , Ron and Hermione had only just joined them when she came striding into view across the lawn, accompanied by Gilderoy Lockhart.
